summary: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.
cast: Laurence Fishburne|Sam Neill|Kathleen Quinlan|Joely Richardson|Richard T. Jones|Jack Noseworthy|Jason Isaacs|Sean Pertwee|Peter Marinker|Holley Chant|Barclay Wright|Noah Huntley|Robert Jezek|Emily Booth
director: Director: Paul W.S. Anderson (as Paul Anderson)
title: Horizonte Final
